column1: #Text=The Brazilian Economist Celso Furtado, aged 84, has died today between 11 and 11:30 am, in his apartament in Rio de Janeiro.
#Text=According to ABr (Government Brazilian news Agency) Celso Furtado was victim of a heart attack.
#Text=He will be buried tomorrow at São João Batista cemetery, Rio de Janeiro at 12:00.
